The Modern Military

The United States Military

The United States Military is part of the Department of Defense, which is the largest employer in the world. However, many people have misconceptions about what the military has to offer. We’d like you to forget everything you think you know about the military and join us on a journey of discovery.

Thinking About Your Students

The college and career opportunities with today’s Military are comprehensive. In part, this course will help you to be mindful of integrating Military options and resources into your greater college and career readiness initiatives with students.
